articles.title: Vivo X Fold5 review: It folds. It lasts. It fits
articles.author: Abhinav Kaustubh
articles.summary: Vivo has launched the X Fold5, a foldable phone priced at Rs 1,49,999. The X Fold5 features a 6,000mAh battery, improved hinge and a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset and Origin Workbench for enhanced multitasking.

articles.title: Bexar County Commissioner Tommy Calvert discusses his San Antonio roots and anti-trafficking advocacy
articles.summary: KENS 5 offers the KENS 5 app. Users can stream KENS 5 content on their phones using this app. The KENS 5 app facilitates the streaming.

articles.title: Wingstop Officially Opens Its Doors in This Mercer County Town
articles.author: Gianna
articles.summary: Wingstop has officially opened a new location in Nassau Park Pavilion, Princeton, NJ. The restaurant is known for chicken wings, fries, and Ranch dressing.

articles.title: Sheetz suing developer of new location in South Abington Twp. over lease
articles.author: The Scranton Times-Tribune
articles.summary: Wendy's is expected to open a new restaurant in the Shoppes at South Abington plaza in the fall. The Shoppes at South Abington plaza will also house a new Sheetz gas station/convenience store.

articles.title: The new entry-level Kindle Colorsoft is $30 off for a limited time
articles.author: Brandt Ranj
articles.summary: Amazon's recently released 16GB Kindle Colorsoft is on sale for $219.99, a $30 discount. The Colorsoft Kids edition, which includes additional features like Amazon Kids Plus and an extended warranty, is also discounted to $239.99.

articles.title: UL Solutions Opens First Commercial and Service Robot Testing Laboratory
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: UL Solutions Inc. has opened a new robot laboratory. This laboratory will provide testing and certification services. The services aim to help manufacturers identify emerging hazards in human-robot interactions.

articles.title: Two Vogue Editors Put the New Dyson Airwrap Coanda 2x to the Test
articles.author: Con√ßetta Ciarlo
articles.summary: Dyson launched the Airwrap Co-anda2x, an upgraded version of its popular hair styling tool. The new Airwrap features improved air pressure, enhanced smoothing technology, and redesigned attachments for faster drying, better styling, and reduced hair damage. The device is powered by Dyson's Hyperdymium 2 motor, offering increased power and maneuverability.

articles.title: Best Labor Day mattress sales of 2025: Tempur-Pedic, Leesa, and more
articles.author: Jennifer Gonick
articles.summary: Casper revamped its all-foam mattress with the The One. DreamCloud introduced a Hybrid mattress. Casper also launched the Snow mattress designed to keep warm sleepers cool. Tempur-Pedic launched the Cloud Mattress, and Tempur-Pedic's introduced a bed that can help cool or warm you by up to 30 degrees. Saatva introduced the Solaire adjustable air bed and Saatva Classic Mattress. Leesa released the Sapira Hybrid Mattress and the Oasis Chill Hybrid Mattress. Nectar introduced a gel memory foam mattress. Bear presented the Bear mattress and the Bear Hybrid mattress. Puffy introduced the Royal Mattress.

articles.title: Lionapk: The Ultimate Guide To Downloading And Using Apps Safely
articles.summary: Lionapk is a third-party Android app store that provides users access to modified and premium apps. It offers a wide collection of applications and modded games, allowing users to download premium apps with unlocked features. The platform provides access to apps not available on official stores, with regular updates and a user-friendly interface.

articles.title: 5 rumored Apple iPhone Fold features that have me excited (and frustrated at the same time)
articles.author: Prakhar Khanna
articles.summary: Apple is reportedly planning to launch its first foldable phone, the iPhone Fold, in 2026. The design is rumored to be similar to the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold series, with thickness measuring around 9-9.5mm when folded and 4.5-4.8mm when unfolded.

articles.title: Google Now Allows Marijuana Business Advertisements Under New Pilot Program In Canada
articles.author: Kyle Jaeger
articles.summary: Google is launching a limited pilot program in Canada, starting August 25, 2025, for up to 20 weeks, allowing federally licensed marijuana businesses to advertise on its search platform. This provides these businesses with the opportunity to have their ads prominently displayed in search results.

articles.title: This Automatic Curler Can Transform A Head Of Hair In Minutes ‚Äî And It's 30% Off Today
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: Tymo launched an automatic curling iron designed for easy and effective hair curling. User reviews highlight the tool's simplicity, speed, and ability to create long-lasting curls on diverse hair types, even replacing existing methods. Celebrity endorsement by Cardi B further supports its effectiveness.

articles.title: NVIDIA Jetson Thor computer gives humanoid robots 7.5x power boost
articles.author: Neetika Walter
articles.summary: NVIDIA has launched the Jetson AGX Thor developer kit, designed for robots and AI applications, including humanoids and industrial machines. Powered by NVIDIA's Blackwell GPU, Jetson Thor delivers significant AI computing power and efficiency compared to its predecessor, enabling real-time AI model execution at the edge. Companies like Amazon Robotics, Boston Dynamics, and Caterpillar are early adopters, testing the platform to advance physical AI.

articles.title: Popular Fashion Brand Quietly Debuts 1st NJ Location In Princeton
articles.author: Sarah Salvadore
articles.summary: Brandy Melville has launched its first New Jersey store in Princeton on Hulfish Street. The store opening coincided with the return of Princeton University students for the fall semester. The store offers Brandy Melville's full range of women's clothing and accessories.

articles.title: Motor Oil Update: API Introduces New ‚ÄòSQ' Service Category
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: API has introduced the "SQ" service category. This new category aims to address the demands of modern turbocharged direct injection engine (TGDI) technology.

articles.title: PicWish Unveils AI Designer: Transform Any Photo with Simple Text Commands
articles.author: Pic Wish
articles.summary: PicWish has launched AI Designer, a new AI-powered image editing function. It will allow users to create and edit images through simple text instructions, offering features like background replacement, hairstyle changes, cartoon style conversion, and old photo restoration. The AI Designer utilizes technologies including Gemini 2.0, GPT Image-1, and Flux Kontext.

articles.title: $45 New Balance Fresh Foam Slides Are Just $20 ‚Äî Hurry Before They Sell Out
articles.author: Rachel Mccarson
articles.summary: New Balance Fresh Foam MRSHN Slide Sandals are on sale at Joe's New Balance Outlet for $20 after discounts, offering a significant reduction from the original price. These slides feature Fresh Foam comfort and sustainable materials. Kobalt 24-in-1 tool is on sale at Lowe's for a limited time.

articles.title: The OnePlus Pad 3: The OnePlus Laptop Hiding Inside A Tablet
articles.author: Ewan Spence
articles.summary: OnePlus has introduced the OnePlus Pad 3, an Android tablet featuring a 13.2-inch display and Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset. The tablet includes an attachable keyboard and kickstand, aiming to provide a laptop-like experience, which enhances productivity. The Pad 3 is designed for portability and can be used effectively with the Chrome browser for various productivity tasks.

articles.title: Revlon Hair Tools Canada Marks 10 Years of the Iconic One-Step‚Ñ¢ Volumizer, a Milestone Worth Celebrating Fran√ßais
articles.author: Helen
articles.summary: Revlon Hair Tools Canada is launching a Limited Edition 10th Anniversary One-Step‚Ñ¢ Volumizer. Also, Revlon Hair Tools Canada will launch Perfect Match Collection and product extensions of the Revlon SmoothStay‚Ñ¢ Collection, including the SmoothStay‚Ñ¢ 1" Coconut Oil-Infused Round Silicone Brush and the SmoothStay‚Ñ¢ 4.5" Coconut Oil-Infused Straightening Brush. The Perfect Match Collection includes the Triple Oil-Infused Hair Dryer, Flat Iron and Hot Styler.

articles.title: Motor Oil Update: New "SQ" Service Category Introduced
articles.author: Michael Harley
articles.summary: The American Petroleum Institute (API) launched a new "SQ" service category for engine oils in March 2025, designed to meet the requirements of modern engines and improve fuel economy. Pennzoil confirmed that their Pennzoil Platinum¬Æ 0W-20 meets the API SQ standards.

articles.title: The 13+ best laundry baskets and hampers of 2025
articles.author: Ambar Pardilla
articles.summary: The article presents several new laundry baskets and hampers available from retailers like Amazon, Target, Walmart and Wayfair. These laundry solutions include wicker hampers, collapsible hampers, rolling hampers from Sterilite, and sorters from Wayfair Basics with features like removable liners, multiple compartments, and wheels for easy transport. These new products are available in different materials, sizes, and colors.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Lite Android tablet revealed: Specifications, availability, and more
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung has announced the Galaxy Tab S10 Lite, a new affordable tablet. It features a 10.9-inch display with a 90Hz refresh rate, S Pen support, and an 8000mAh battery.

articles.title: Amazon's redesigned Fire TV software starts rolling out today
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Amazon is launching its redesigned Fire TV software today. This update represents a change to the existing Fire TV service offered by Amazon.

articles.title: Mr. Eazi Wants To Sell Shares Of His Yet-To-Be-Released Music To Fans
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Mr. Eazi announced plans to sell shares of his yet-to-be-released songs to his fans. He revealed this experimental plan on his Twitter page, allowing fans to buy shares in his music.

articles.title: Your next co-founder might be a model: Building startups with AI agents
articles.author: Agathas Agu
articles.summary: Startups are leveraging AI tools like GPT-4o, Jasper, Copy.ai, and Beautiful.ai for rapid prototyping, automated marketing, and design tasks. Moveworks, an AI-powered platform, automates employee support by integrating with communication platforms like Slack and Microsoft Teams to efficiently resolve workplace issues.

articles.title: Google has the new Pixel 10 coming. Is the Pixel 9 still worth buying?
articles.author: Jerry Hildenbrand
articles.summary: Google has released the Pixel 10, featuring the Tensor G5 processor and new AI camera capabilities. The Pixel 10 also features new Gemini-based software features like Camera Coach. While the Pixel 9, equipped with the Tensor G4 processor, will receive many of the same software updates, the Pixel 10 offers newer hardware and exclusive features, justifying its higher price point compared to discounted Pixel 9 models.

articles.title: Samsung's Latest Ads Critique Apple While Highlighting Its Foldable Innovations
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is intensifying its rivalry with Apple through a new advertising campaign that highlights its Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 foldable phones. The ads emphasize the features of the foldable phones while subtly critiquing Apple's iPhone lineup. This campaign aims to position Samsung as a leader in mobile innovation and attract consumers seeking alternatives to traditional smartphones.

articles.title: You'll need a $35 cable in order to use Apple's new $550 AirPods Max with your non-Bluetooth devices (AAPL)
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Apple launched its first over-ear headphones, AirPods Max, priced at $549, which are equipped with Bluetooth. A separate $35 cable is required to connect the AirPods Max to devices without Bluetooth. The AirPods Max are available for purchase starting December 15, with potential shipping delays up to 14 weeks.

articles.title: Fall favorites back at Starbucks, including Pumpkin Spice Latte and Racciin Cake Pop
articles.author: app
articles.summary: Starbucks has launched its 'Green Apron Service' nationwide to enhance speed, personalization, and hospitality in its 11,000 stores.

articles.title: Get $60 off the Bruvi Bundle's single-serve coffee system
articles.author: Amanda Edelman
articles.summary: Bruvi is offering a discount on the Bruvi Bundle, a single-serve coffee machine, now priced at $338. The bundle includes a variety pack of B-pods and features an iPhone-compatible app for remote brewing and B-pod ordering. The Bruvi machine can brew espresso, coffee, cold brew, Americanos, and tea, and includes a hygienic system that prevents flavor overlap.

articles.title: Casper Wave Hybrid Snow review: What to know about the cooling Canadian mattress
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Casper has launched the Casper Wave Hybrid Snow Mattress, a 13-inch hybrid cooling mattress featuring QuickCool cover, Airscape technology, and HeatDelete bands. Available in three firmness levels with prices ranging from $3,499 to $6,599, the mattress aims to provide a cooler sleep experience, reduce motion transfer, and offer ergonomic comfort.

articles.title: The Benefits Of Multi-Use Body Care Products For Busy Lives
articles.author: FPJ Web Desk
articles.summary: Multi-use body care products are introduced to streamline skincare routines. The Body Shop's collection features multi-use items such as body butters and body oils. These products are ethically sourced and cruelty-free.

articles.title: Why Google's new Pixel 10 mobile is the best yet ‚Äì but I'm sad to see a hugely useful feature disappear
articles.author: Assistant Technology
articles.summary: Google launched its Pixel 10 smartphone series, introducing new features such as the Pro Res Zoom and Pixelsnap accessories, which include magnetic Qi2 chargers, stands, and cases. However, the Battery Share feature has been removed. The price of the new models starts at ¬£799 / $799, same as the previous year.

articles.title: NVIDIA Blackwell-Powered Jetson Thor Now Available, Accelerating the Age of General Robotics
articles.author: NVIDIA
articles.summary: NVIDIA has released the Jetson AGX Thor developer kit and production modules, new robotics computers. Powered by an NVIDIA Blackwell GPU, Jetson Thor delivers up to 2,070 FP4 teraflops of AI compute and features 128GB of memory, and it offers 7.5x higher AI compute and 3.5x greater energy efficiency compared to Jetson Orin.

articles.title: YEEDI M14 PLUS: Clean Floors, Calm Mind, Wellness Ritual
articles.summary: YEEDI has introduced the YEEDI M14 PLUS, a robot vacuum featuring the OZMO fresh water mopping system. This system uses a patented horizontal roller mop that sprays, scrubs, rinses, and extracts in real-time, ensuring only fresh water is used. YEEDI roller mop models, including the M14 PLUS, are now available at starting prices of $699.

articles.title: Za 'n Zee launches 'Pista Kulfi' ice cream in couple pack
articles.author: Star Business Desk
articles.summary: Za 'n Zee, a brand of Kazi Food Industries Limited, has launched 'Pista Kulfi Ice Cream,' a new couple-pack ice cream with a new flavour, in Bangladesh. The 280 ml tub is priced at Tk 150 and features two spoons for sharing, and it is expected to be available across Bangladesh in retail outlets and super shops.

articles.title: 26 Products With Such Riveting Results, You'll Question Why You Waited So Long To Buy Them
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Nivea introduced a lightweight gel cream, enriched with Q10. Good Molecules launched Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel to reduce swelling and puffiness. Sol de Janerio launched Brazilian Bum Bum body cream featuring guarana extract, coconut oil, and caffeine.

articles.title: 'Easy to use' pressure washer that offers 'unbelievable cleaning' now just ¬£65
articles.author: Ewan Mowat
articles.summary: Amazon has discounted the Blucky 6 in 1 Cordless Pressure Washer by 40%, offering it at ¬£64.98. The pressure washer features an adjustable pressure system, six-in-one spray nozzle, and provides 50-70 minutes of runtime with its two 4000mAh batteries. Customer reviews highlight its lightweight design and effectiveness in cleaning various surfaces.

articles.title: Microsoft, IBM, and Google Lead with Generative AI, Cloud Innovations, and Strategic Partnerships
articles.author: Research
articles.summary: Microsoft, IBM, and Google are identified as key players in the AI for Customer Service market. Microsoft is focused on generative AI and cloud-based solutions, enhancing its Dynamics 365. IBM's Watsonx platform enhances data processing. Google leverages its Gemini model for superior data analysis, expanding its product portfolio through partnerships like the one with Tata Consultancy Services.

articles.title: Agilitas Sports appoints Gourishanker Jha as Chief Digital and Technology Officer
articles.author: Best Media Info Bureau 25
articles.summary: Agilitas Sports is investing in performance product development, digital commerce, and athlete-focused experiences. These investments are in preparation for several planned brand launches in 2025. The company aims to build a digital backbone to drive business growth and redefine the sportswear experience.

articles.title: Huawei Data Storage AI SSD Launches on the 27th, May Support Memory Expansion
articles.author: Digital Phablet
articles.summary: Huawei will launch a new AI-powered SSD on the 27th of this month. The new storage device aims to boost performance for high-demand applications and may feature enhanced capabilities such as expandable graphics memory.

articles.title: The New York Times Debuts 'It's Your World to Understand' Campaign (The New York Times Company)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: The New York Times launched "It's Your World to Understand," a new brand marketing campaign. This campaign highlights how Times journalism and products empower people. The aim is to improve user understanding and engagement.

articles.title: Windows PowerToys can boost productivity. Here's why you might not need them
articles.summary: Microsoft relaunched Windows PowerToys in 2019 as an open-source project for Windows 10 and 11, offering a collection of utilities to enhance productivity and customization. The actively maintained PowerToys includes tools like FancyZones for custom window layouts, PowerToys Run for quick launching, and Keyboard Manager for remapping keys. It provides a safer and lightweight alternative to third-party tweaks for users seeking more control over their Windows environment.

articles.title: Windows PowerToys can boost productivity. Here's why you might not need them
articles.author: Ken Colburn
articles.summary: Microsoft resurrected Windows PowerToys in 2019 as an open-source project for Windows 10 and 11. Microsoft engineers actively maintain PowerToys, offering a free way to boost productivity by adding extra features. PowerToys includes utilities like FancyZones and PowerToys Run.

articles.title: Windows PowerToys can boost productivity. Here's why you might not need them
articles.author: Ken Colburn
articles.summary: Microsoft resurrected Windows PowerToys in 2019 as an open-source effort for Windows 10 and 11.  PowerToys is a collection of separate utilities bundled into a single package, which can boost productivity. Microsoft actively maintains PowerToys, offering a reliable and free way to add extra features.

articles.title: Issei Mochi Gummies Announces Nationwide Launch In World Market Stores
articles.author: NOSH
articles.summary: Issei Mochi Gummies announced the national launch of their product. Issei Mochi Gummies are the first all-natural mochi candy brand.

articles.title: VERSES¬Æ Receives Patent for Specifying Domain Models with Active Inference Agents
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: VERSES AI Inc. has received a US patent (12,393,581 B2) for 'A Method and System for Specifying an Active Inference based agent using Natural Language'. This patent introduces a novel approach for designing domain models, enhancing the capabilities of VERSES' Genius platform by allowing enterprises to design intelligent agents using natural language.

articles.title: How GPT-5 surprised me
articles.author: Ezra Klein
articles.summary: OpenAI released GPT-5, its newest AI model.  The model is a leap in what it feels like to use an AI model.  AI tools are being integrated into fields such as medicine, programming, and law.

articles.title: From Cloud Nine to Toy Shelves: L.O.L. Surprise! x Care Bears Collab Brings Six Limited-Edition
articles.author: The Eagle-Tribune
articles.summary: L.O.L. Surprise!‚Ñ¢ is a global brand.

articles.title: 36 'Treat Yourself' Products That Actually Make Your Life A Lot Easier
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Ninja introduced a new portable Crispi Air Fryer system. This system allows users to cook and eat from the same container, catering to individuals with high culinary standards and busy schedules. The "all-in-one system" simplifies the cooking process.

articles.title: Student creates app that recommends ideal laundry time based on weather conditions
articles.author: Gma Integrated News
articles.summary: JD, a computer science major and software developer, launched the "Maglalaba App" in July, designed to advise users on the best days for doing laundry based on weather conditions. The app sources data from Open Meteo and presents information in a user-friendly format, and it has already generated over 60,000 users since its launch.

articles.title: Dictionary.com's Summer Word Drop is Here. This Time it's Supersized.
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Dictionary.com launched its '2025 Summer Word Drop,' introducing 1,235 new word entries. This update, the largest in Dictionary.com's history, includes terms from various categories like stadium slang, Japanese culinary terms, and emerging cultural trends, reflecting how English adapts to current events and global influences. IXL Learning's Dictionary Media Group emphasizes that the Word Drop captures how people are living, working, and communicating today.

articles.title: NIO (NIO) Surges 31.8% as Investors Optimistic About SUV Launch
articles.author: Angelica Ballesteros
articles.summary: NIO Inc. is launching its budget-friendly SUV, ES8, next month with a starting price of 308,800 yuan ($43,000) for the battery subscription plan. The company previously launched Onvo L90. The ES8 is the largest battery electric vehicle in China, measuring 5,280 mm in length and 3,130 mm in wheelbase.

articles.title: Centric PLM Deploys Visionary Innovations for the Cosmetics Industry to Boost Product Development Efficiency, Compliance and Time to Market
articles.author: Centric Software
articles.summary: Centric Software has introduced the latest version of its Centric PLM platform. The new platform includes powerful AI features and an advanced compliance engine as part of its cosmetics solution updates.

articles.title: 33 Effective And Affordable Beauty Products
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: Maybelline introduces a hydrating setting spray for a dewy look. E.l.f. Cosmetics launches Lash Xtndr tubing mascara. Nyx presents a creamy, long-lasting lip gloss with a vegan formula for 12-hour hydration.

articles.title: Renault Duster Zen 4WD: Mildly in a league of its own
articles.author: Eyaaz Matwadia
articles.summary: Renault has launched the third-generation Duster, featuring a stylish and robust design with Y-shaped LED headlights and a larger grille. The new Duster includes a 10.1-inch infotainment system, improved safety features like six airbags, and a 4WD monitor in the 4WD model. The Duster is available in three derivatives: the Zen EDC 4√ó2, the Intens 4√ó2 and the Zen 6MT 4WD Mild Hybrid.

articles.title: 47 Things Reviewers Buy Over And Over Again

articles.summary: Gold Bond introduced a firming neck and chest cream with aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil. EOS launched a Shea Butter Pomegranate Raspberry Body Lotion. Nivea released a skin-firming gel cream with Q10 for loose skin. Lottabody released Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse for hair definition and frizz reduction. Catrice released 'Instant Awake' Under Eye Brightener for concealing dark circles.

articles.title: This Laundry Detergent Bottle Has A Genius Feature That Solves A Common Problem

DedCool launches a luxury, non-toxic laundry detergent in Xtra Milk scent, packaged in an eco-conscious aluminum carton with refill options. Other products discussed include stain removers, wool dryer balls, and specialty detergents for various fabrics by brands like The Laundress, Napisan, Persil, and Tyler Candle Company.

articles.title: This Laundry Detergent Bottle Has A Genius Feature That Solves A Common Problem
articles.author: Marsha Badger
articles.summary: Swash introduced 'Smells Like Clean Laundry,' an ultra-concentrated laundry detergent featuring an innovative auto-stop dispensing system. The 30-ounce bottle handles up to 80 loads, designed for both high-efficiency and non-HE machines. Consumer reviews highlight its ease of use, effective cleaning, and pleasant fragrance.

articles.title: Back-to-school organization for high school, college & beyond
articles.author: The Curator Team
articles.summary: The article suggests several products for students heading back to school. Tide Pods Oxi Max are recommended as a laundry solution with stain-fighting and odor-busting features. The article also proposes the Bear Steamer as a compact solution for wrinkle-free shirts.

articles.title: Circles and OpenAI Collaborate Globally to Build a Fully AI-Native Telco Platform
articles.author: Global
articles.summary: Circles, in collaboration with OpenAI, is launching a new AI-native SaaS platform for the telco industry. The platform, initially launching in Singapore via Circles.Life's app, aims to improve customer experience and operator efficiency. It will also provide personalized digital experiences through an agentic AI app.

articles.title: Xbox cloud gaming coming to iOS and PC in Spring 2021
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: Microsoft plans to launch its cloud gaming service, Project xCloud, on iOS and computers in Spring 2021. The cloud gaming service is an addition to their existing availability on Android devices.

articles.title: The New York Times Debuts 'It's Your World to Understand' Campaign
articles.summary: The New York Times launched 'It's Your World to Understand,' a new brand marketing campaign. The campaign highlights how Times journalism and products empower people to understand the world. The campaign will run from August through October across various advertising platforms.

articles.title: Current Point opens third outlet in Sankhamul
articles.author: THT Online
articles.summary: Yasoda Foods launched a new outlet of its noodle chain 'Current Point' in Sankhamul, Kathmandu, offering new dishes like Noozza, Yummy Slurrp, Crispy Rolls, and Cheese Pocket. The company aims to cater to the youth demographic with spicy and flavorful noodle creations.

articles.title: Every question you ever had about laundry answered by a top New York dry cleaner
articles.author: Hosanna Boulter
articles.summary: Zachary Pozniak, chief operating officer of Jeeves New York, launched asknyjeeves.com earlier this year. This new service is an artificial intelligence (AI) laundry assistant designed to answer all laundry-related questions.

articles.summary: Myntra launched M-Now, a quick-delivery service, in Hyderabad. The launch follows successful pilots in Bangalore, Delhi, and Gurgaon.

Vacation launched Orange Gel√©e SPF 30 Gel. Yankee Candle introduced Midsummer's Night candle. Dr Teal's launched Hawaiian Bliss Epsom salt magnesium soak. Billion Dollar Brows launched Eyebrow Powder.

articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: LG CNS has introduced Agent Works and AX Think, enterprise-level AI solutions designed to autonomously orchestrate work. Agent Works provides foundational AI capabilities, while AX Think offers collaborative AI services. LG Display has already seen productivity increases, leading to significant cost reductions with these AI solutions.

articles.title: From cost barrier to competitive edge: flexible finance makes smart tech accessible
articles.author: Shane van der Merwe
articles.summary: Merchant West finances technology adoption, offering flexible plans for businesses to access AI chatbots, IoT vehicle trackers, and bundled solutions. articles.summary: LG Electronics has introduced its advanced OLED evo and QNED evo models, featuring enhanced picture quality and vibrant color. These new TVs include AI-powered personalization features and are designed to provide immersive entertainment experiences.

articles.summary: LG CNS has launched AgenticWorks, an enterprise-focused agentic AI platform, and a:xink, an AI service. These are designed to help industries accelerate their AI transformation globally.

articles.summary: Unilux is introducing a "5in1 total unmanned laundry" model in the second half of the year. This new concept store combines five laundry convenience services and features kiosks for unmanned dry cleaning and a conveyor system for space utilization. The conveyor system alone has three patent applications.

The company also plans to launch 'Synergia,' a hybrid cloud management platform, in the second half of the year and 'GeniA,' an AI-based development and operation automation platform, in the first half of 2026.

articles.title: How to Buy Unlocked Phones, and Why You Should Definitely Consider This, by Mary Hunt
articles.summary: Apple, Samsung, Google, and Motorola sell unlocked phone models directly on their websites. Buying unlocked phones allow customers to shop for cheaper plans from Mint Mobile, Visible and Consumer Cellular. The unlocked phones can also be bought from Trusted retailers like Best Buy, Walmart and Amazon.

LG Display is introducing a:xink to its employees, offering AI-enabled knowledge search, real-time translation during video conferencing, automated meeting minutes, and email summarization, all within the company's internal network.

articles.title: Cubot P90 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson

The phone has a 6.88-inch IPS LCD screen, a Mediatek Helio G100 processor, and a dual-camera setup with a 64-megapixel main sensor and will cost P12,907.62.

articles.title: Tesla launching new ÔøΩ35,000 EV as it battles competition from China

articles.title: Top Body Shower Gels for Clean, Smooth, and Hydrated Skin
articles.summary: The company offers several new shower gels and body washes. These include a honey & vanilla-infused body wash for hydration, a 5% AHA body wash for acne and tan removal, a Niacinamide body wash for acne and irritation, a brightening body wash with Niacinamide and Kojic Acid, a body wash with zinc PCA for acne and ingrown hairs, and a moisturizing shower gel with shea butter.

articles.title: LG SHOWCASES ADVANCED COMMERCIAL LAUNDRY SOLUTIONS AT CLEAN SHOW 2025
articles.summary: LG Electronics presented its advanced commercial laundry solutions at Clean Show 2025, showcasing products tailored for laundromats, hotels, and healthcare facilities. The LG PROFESSIONAL LAUNDRY lineup makes its debut, featuring technologies like the Ball Balancing System and Dual Action Heat Exchange System. LG is also collaborating with Rinse to explore new opportunities for laundry and dry-cleaning solutions.

articles.title: LG SHOWCASES ADVANCED COMMERCIAL LAUNDRY SOLUTIONS AT CLEAN SHOW 2025
articles.author: PRNEWSWIRE
articles.summary: LG Electronics is showcasing its new commercial laundry solutions at Clean Show 2025 in Orlando, featuring the PROFESSIONAL LAUNDRY lineup with AI-driven technologies and energy-efficient designs.  The company is also highlighting connected innovations in its Smart Laundry LAB, developed in collaboration with Rinse, to improve operational excellence and customer service. The new products aim to enhance LG's position in the North American commercial laundry market.

articles.title: Everyday Cheapskate: Here's why it's worth your money to buy an unlocked phone
articles.author: Everyday Cheapskate
articles.summary: Apple, Samsung, Google, and Motorola sell fully unlocked phone models directly on their websites, offering consumers the flexibility to choose their carrier and avoid contracts. Retailers like Best Buy, Walmart, and Amazon also offer unlocked phones, allowing consumers to avoid bloatware and have more control over their phone plans.

articles.title: LG SHOWCASES ADVANCED COMMERCIAL LAUNDRY SOLUTIONS AT CLEAN SHOW 2025
articles.summary: LG Electronics is showcasing its new commercial laundry solutions, featuring AI-driven technologies and energy efficiency, at Clean Show 2025. TCG Unite, Asia's first all-in-one TCG marketplace app, is launching in Singapore, providing a secure platform for cross-border trading of trading card games.

articles.title: LG SHOWCASES ADVANCED COMMERCIAL LAUNDRY SOLUTIONS AT CLEAN SHOW 2025
articles.author: ÁæéÈÄöÁ§æ
articles.summary: LG Electronics is showcasing its advanced commercial laundry solutions at Clean Show 2025, featuring the flagship LG PROFESSIONAL LAUNDRY lineup, which is engineered for high-volume environments, combining durability with advanced efficiency. LG is also highlighting connected innovations in its Smart Laundry LAB, presented in collaboration with Rinse, including Laundry Crew 3.0 and the Smart API, to streamline management and enhance efficiency in commercial laundry operations.

articles.title: Dunelm's 'totally brilliant' ¬£55 clothes dryer 'works better than an airer'
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: Dunelm is offering the Clothes Dryer Pod for ¬£55 as a cheaper alternative to tumble dryers. The Clothes Dryer Pod features a ceramic heating element, overheat protection, and a three-hour timer, costing approximately 18p per hour to run. Customers have praised its efficiency and performance.

articles.summary: NIO (ËîöÊù•) announced that NIO Day 2025 will be held in Hangzhou in late September, where the new ES8 will be officially launched. The NIO ES8, a flagship SUV, was officially released and opened for pre-sale on August 21, 2025, featuring a 900V high-voltage architecture, 102kWh battery, and a 520kW dual-motor system.

articles.title: 35 Holy Grail Products That Cannot Be Disrespected
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The content highlights the introduction and benefits of several new products and services. Medicube launched Glow Facial Serum for acne spot treatment, while Lottabody introduced Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse for hair hydration. Additionally, Clinique restocked their Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm.

articles.title: Tesco wants to install car wash station in Risca car park
articles.author: Nicholas Thomas
articles.summary: Tesco has applied for planning permission to introduce a new jetwash service at its store. The station will include self-service jet washers, air and screen wash, and vacuum cleaners, and will be monitored by CCTV.

articles.title: Local Texas Representative billed nearly $10,000 for skipping town during House sessions
articles.summary: Users can stream KENS 5 content on their phones. This is facilitated through the KENS 5 app.

articles.title: Gen Z Shopping Trend Prioritizes Self-Reward To Latest Lifestyle Products
articles.summary: Blibli re-launched the Blibli Prypto program on August 25, 2025, offering various products. Other companies are highlighted for new products that address Gen Z trends; Samsung promoted the Galaxy Fold 7, Nordics offered padel rackets, and Huawei released the MatePad 11.5 tablet.

articles.title: Honor 7D Unveiled: Features 6.77-Inch Display and Snapdragon 685 Processor
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Honor has introduced the X7d, a new budget-friendly smartphone featuring a 6.77-inch LCD, Snapdragon 685 processor, and a 108MP primary camera. The device boasts a 6,500 mAh battery with 35W SuperCharge and runs on MagicOS 9.0 based on Android 15, available in Desert Gold, Ocean Cyan, Meteor Silver, and Velvet Black colors.

articles.title: Woh Hup Reaffirms Its Heritage and Culinary Legacy with Modern Innovations
articles.author: Devki Yadav
articles.summary: Woh Hup, a Singaporean culinary brand, has launched a new China Flavour Instant Noodles series. The series includes three variants: Dried Shanghai Scallion Oil Noodles, Dried Sichuan Pepper Noodles, and Dried Shanxi Spicy Oil Noodles. The noodles are non-fried, cholesterol-free, and trans fat-free and are available at major retail outlets across Singapore.

articles.title: All the middle of Lidl bargains hitting shelves from TODAY including household essential and handy gardening gadget
articles.author: Owen Scott
articles.summary: LIDL has launched new products in its middle aisle, including household essentials, gardening gadgets, and cleaning products. Key products include the Tower Aquajet Plus Carpet Washer for ¬£69.99, the Nimble Anti-Tangle Vac for ¬£59.99, and the Bosch Readyy'y Cordless Vacuum Cleaner for ¬£99.99, which is significantly cheaper than on the Bosch website.

articles.title: Woh Hup Reaffirms Its Heritage and Culinary Legacy with Modern Innovations
articles.summary: Woh Hup, a Singaporean culinary heritage brand, has introduced the 'China Flavour Instant Noodles' series, featuring Dried Shanghai Scallion Oil Noodles, Dried Sichuan Pepper Noodles, and Dried Shanxi Spicy Oil Noodles. These non-fried, cholesterol-free noodles are now available at major retail outlets across Singapore. The new series reaffirms Woh Hup's position as a trusted homegrown brand.

articles.title: Everyday Cheapskate: How to Buy Unlocked Phones, and Why You Should Definitely Consider This
articles.author: Mary Hunt
articles.summary: Apple, Samsung, Google, and Motorola sell fully unlocked phones directly on their websites. Retailers like Best Buy, Walmart, and Amazon also offer unlocked models.  Swappa, Back Market, and Gazelle specialize in refurbished and tested phones.

articles.title: Azizi Developments Launches Azizi Wares in Dubai's Downtown Jebel Ali
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Azizi Developments has launched Azizi Wares, a new freehold residential and retail development in the UAE.

articles.title: Perplexity Will Share Revenue From AI Searches With Publishers
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Perplexity has launched Comet Plus, a new subscription tier available for Perplexity Pro and Max customers. This represents an expansion of Perplexity's service offerings.

articles.title: The new entry-level Kindle Colorsoft is $30 off for a limited time
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Amazon has launched the 16GB Kindle Colorsoft, which is currently on sale for $219.99. The new Colorsoft Kids, including Amazon Kids Plus subscription, extended warranty and a cover, is discounted to $239.99.

articles.title: ZLINE Launches DuoPro‚Ñ¢, Redefining What's Possible in the Home Kitchen
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: ZLINE Kitchen and Bath has launched the DuoPro‚Ñ¢ cooktop. The DuoPro‚Ñ¢ features an innovative design which delivers full-range simmer-to-sear performance on every burner. This product aims to change consumer expectations for cooktops.

articles.title: LG Innotek Promotes 'Next-generation Digital Key Solution', Aiming to Nurture Its Automotive Communication Components into a 1.08 billion USD Business over the next 30 Years
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: LG Innotek unveiled its 'Next-generation Digital Key Solution' to the media. This innovative component integrates LG Innotek's wireless communication technology to provide exceptional customer value.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Lite launched with Exynos 1380 and 8,000mAh battery
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Tab S Lite. The new tablet features an Exynos processor and a mAh battery.

articles.title: Little Luxuries Are Important, So Let Me Introduce You To A Few Of Our Favourite Tinted Lip Balms From Canadian Brands
articles.author: CTV
articles.summary: VASANTI launched Best Balm, a Canadian-made moisturizing balm. This balm provides a soft, natural color.

articles.title: Stanley travel mug that keeps 'coffee piping hot for hours' slashed to just ÔøΩ16
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Stanley's Classic Legendary Camp Travel Mug is currently offered at a discounted price on Amazon.

articles.title: Galaxy Tab S10 Lite: A Value-Packed Tablet for Everyday Needs (Samsung Electronics America Inc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. has unveiled the Galaxy Tab S10 Lite, an affordable tablet. The Galaxy Tab S10 Lite features a large display and a bundled S Pen.

articles.title: Smeg's new Mini Milk Frother prepares perfect foam for cappuccinos ‚Äì but it's too thick ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Smeg introduced a super-compact frother. The frother operates quietly and simply. The device produces a seriously thick foam texture.

articles.title: Centric PLM Deploys Visionary Innovations for the Cosmetics Industry to Boost Product Development Efficiency, Compliance and Time to Market
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Centric Software introduces new AI features and an advanced compliance engine as part of its latest cosmetics solution updates. These updates are part of the latest evolution of Centric's Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) platform, Centric PLM. The updates aim to streamline workflows, boost system performance and elevate the user experience.

articles.title: First-Time Editors: How CapCut PC's Text-to-Speech AI Simplifies Adding Narration Without Recording Equipment
articles.author: BW Online Bureau
articles.summary: CapCut Desktop Video Editor introduces a Text-to-Speech AI tool that converts written dialogue into natural-sounding voiceovers. This feature allows users to create professional narration without needing microphones or recording equipment. The tool offers various voice options and integrates with the video editing process, simplifying narration and enhancing video quality.
